title: Look before you eat (TEFC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Nutrition - Study and teaching

description: A practical look at our eating habits, their relationship to our health, and the influences of advertising on our food choices. Examines experiments with the sugar, fat and salt intake of a group of students. Also looks at the role of the food industry and vending machines. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
